snippet: Robby Fabbri broke out of a scoring funk and added to his hat collection in the process....
lead_paragraph: Robby Fabbri broke out of a scoring funk and added to his hat collection in the process.

headline.main: Fabbri Nets Hat Trick as Blues Come Back to Beat Flyers 6-3
headline.print_headline: Fabbri Nets Hat Trick as Blues Come Back to Beat Flyers 6-3
